::Battera::

She was heading to her room when she saw Rex approach her door. It 
supprized her and she droped the fruit bowl.
"Oh, I'm sorry. I..I wasn't expecting you. Please, I was only 
getting..."she looked at the fruit on the floor,"some fruit." Her 
face flushed a deep red as she bent down to pick up the dropped 
fruit. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex/Grimmler::
> 
> "Hey, Grimmler!"
> 
> Grimmler turns around, looking at Rex. "Yeah?"
> 
> "Can you see what this bot wants? I have something to take care 
off."
> 
> Grimmler sighs. "Sure, why not?" The Maximal walks over to 
Sinisher, Rex 
> walking off toward Battera's room.
